name: Breakout (itch) (benhenderson)
description:
A small attempt at making breakout I created using the phaser frame work on the html5 canvas.

Click the mouse to begin and hold down mouse one for the paddle to follow the cursor, if the ball goes below the button of the screen you lose one life and the ball will reset. Breaking all blocks will allow you to proceed to the next level, which increases your score and also the balls speed. When you run out of lives you will have the option to join the high score leader board.
